ayah: كٓهيعٓصٓ
ayah_translit: kaf-ha-ya-ain-sad
ayah_english: Kaaf Ha Ya Ain Sad

ayah: ذِكۡرُ رَحۡمَتِ رَبِّكَ عَبۡدَهُۥ زَكَرِيَّآ
ayah_translit: dhik'ru rahmati rabbika abdahu zakariyya
ayah_english: (A) mention (of the) Mercy (of) your Lord (to) His servant Zakariya

ayah: إِذۡ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥ نِدَآءً خَفِيّٗا
ayah_translit: idh nada rabbahu nidaan khafiyyan
ayah_english: When he called (to) his Lord a call secret

ayah: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي وَهَنَ ٱلۡعَظۡمُ مِنِّي وَٱشۡتَعَلَ ٱلرَّأۡسُ شَيۡبٗا وَلَمۡ أَكُنۢ بِدُعَآئِكَ رَبِّ شَقِيّٗا
ayah_translit: qala rabbi inni wahana al-'azmu minni wa-ish'ta'ala al-rasu shayban walam akun bidu'aika rabbi shaqiyyan
ayah_english: He said My Lord Indeed, [I] (have) weakened my bones my bones and flared (my) head (with) white and not I have been in (my) supplication (to) You my Lord unblessed

ayah: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي وَهَنَ ٱلۡعَظۡمُ مِنِّي وَٱشۡتَعَلَ ٱلرَّأۡسُ شَيۡبٗا وَلَمۡ أَكُنۢ بِدُعَآئِكَ رَبِّ شَقِيّٗا

ayah: وَإِنِّي خِفۡتُ ٱلۡمَوَٰلِيَ مِن وَرَآءِي وَكَانَتِ ٱمۡرَأَتِي عَاقِرٗا فَهَبۡ لِي مِن لَّدُنكَ وَلِيّٗا
ayah_translit: wa-inni khif'tu al-mawaliya min warai wakanati im'ra-ati aqiran fahab li min ladunka waliyyan
ayah_english: And indeed, I [I] fear the successors after me after me and is my wife barren So give [to] me from Yourself an heir

ayah: وَإِنِّي خِفۡتُ ٱلۡمَوَٰلِيَ مِن وَرَآءِي وَكَانَتِ ٱمۡرَأَتِي عَاقِرٗا فَهَبۡ لِي مِن لَّدُنكَ وَلِيّٗا

ayah: يَرِثُنِي وَيَرِثُ مِنۡ ءَالِ يَعۡقُوبَۖ وَٱجۡعَلۡهُ رَبِّ رَضِيّٗا
ayah_translit: yarithuni wayarithu min ali ya'quba wa-ij'alhu rabbi radiyyan
ayah_english: Who will inherit me and inherit from (the) family (of) Yaqub And make him my Lord pleasing

ayah_translit: yarithuni wayarithu min ali ya'quba wa-ij'alhu rabbi radiyyan
ayah_english: Who will inherit me and inherit from (the) family (of) Yaqub And make him my Lord pleasing

ayah: يَٰزَكَرِيَّآ إِنَّا نُبَشِّرُكَ بِغُلَٰمٍ ٱسۡمُهُۥ يَحۡيَىٰ لَمۡ نَجۡعَل لَّهُۥ مِن قَبۡلُ سَمِيّٗا
ayah_translit: yazakariyya inna nubashiruka bighulamin us'muhu yahya lam naj'al lahu min qablu samiyyan
ayah_english: O Zakariya Indeed, We [We] give you glad tidings of a boy his name (will be) Yahya not We (have) assigned [for] it before before (this) name

ayah: قَالَ رَبِّ أَنَّىٰ يَكُونُ لِي غُلَٰمٞ وَكَانَتِ ٱمۡرَأَتِي عَاقِرٗا وَقَدۡ بَلَغۡتُ مِنَ ٱلۡكِبَرِ عِتِيّٗا
ayah_translit: qala rabbi anna yakunu li ghulamun wakanati im'ra-ati aqiran waqad balaghtu mina al-kibari itiyyan
ayah_english: He said My Lord! How can I have a boy while is my wife barren and indeed I have reached of the old age extreme

ayah: قَالَ رَبِّ أَنَّىٰ يَكُونُ لِي غُلَٰمٞ وَكَانَتِ ٱمۡرَأَتِي عَاقِرٗا وَقَدۡ بَلَغۡتُ مِنَ ٱلۡكِبَرِ عِتِيّٗا

ayah: قَالَ كَذَٰلِكَ قَالَ رَبُّكَ هُوَ عَلَيَّ هَيِّنٞ وَقَدۡ خَلَقۡتُكَ مِن قَبۡلُ وَلَمۡ تَكُ شَيۡـٔٗا
ayah_translit: qala kadhalika qala rabbuka huwa alayya hayyinun waqad khalaqtuka min qablu walam taku shayan
ayah_english: He said Thus said your Lord It (is) easy for Me (is) easy for Me and certainly I (have) created you before before while not you were anything

ayah: قَالَ كَذَٰلِكَ قَالَ رَبُّكَ هُوَ عَلَيَّ هَيِّنٞ وَقَدۡ خَلَقۡتُكَ مِن قَبۡلُ وَلَمۡ تَكُ شَيۡـٔٗا

ayah: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱجۡعَل لِّيٓ ءَايَةٗۖ قَالَ ءَايَتُكَ أَلَّا تُكَلِّمَ ٱلنَّاسَ ثَلَٰثَ لَيَالٖ سَوِيّٗا
ayah_translit: qala rabbi ij'al li ayatan qala ayatuka alla tukallima al-nasa thalatha layalin sawiyyan
ayah_english: He said My Lord! Make for me a sign He said Your sign (is) that not you will speak (to) the people (for) three nights sound

ayah: فَخَرَجَ عَلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِۦ مِنَ ٱلۡمِحۡرَابِ فَأَوۡحَىٰٓ إِلَيۡهِمۡ أَن سَبِّحُواْ بُكۡرَةٗ وَعَشِيّٗا
ayah_translit: fakharaja ala qawmihi mina al-mih'rabi fa-awha ilayhim an sabbihu buk'ratan wa'ashiyyan
ayah_english: Then he came out to his people from the prayer chamber and he signaled to them to glorify (Allah) (in) the morning and (in) the evening

ayah: يَٰيَحۡيَىٰ خُذِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ بِقُوَّةٖۖ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلۡحُكۡمَ صَبِيّٗا
ayah_translit: yayahya khudhi al-kitaba biquwwatin waataynahu al-huk'ma sabiyyan
ayah_english: O Yahya! Hold the Scripture with strength And We gave him [the] wisdom (when he was) a child

ayah: وَحَنَانٗا مِّن لَّدُنَّا وَزَكَوٰةٗۖ وَكَانَ تَقِيّٗا
ayah_translit: wahananan min ladunna wazakatan wakana taqiyyan
ayah_english: And affection from Us and purity and he was righteous

ayah: وَبَرَّۢا بِوَٰلِدَيۡهِ وَلَمۡ يَكُن جَبَّارًا عَصِيّٗا
ayah_translit: wabarran biwalidayhi walam yakun jabbaran asiyyan
ayah_english: And dutiful to his parents and not he was a tyrant disobedient

ayah: وَبَرَّۢا بِوَٰلِدَيۡهِ وَلَمۡ يَكُن جَبَّارًا عَصِيّٗا
ayah_translit: wabarran biwalidayhi walam yakun jabbaran asiyyan
ayah_english: And dutiful to his parents and not he was a tyrant disobedient

ayah: وَبَرَّۢا بِوَٰلِدَيۡهِ وَلَمۡ يَكُن جَبَّارًا عَصِيّٗا
ayah_translit: wabarran biwalidayhi walam yakun jabbaran asiyyan
ayah_english: And dutiful to his parents and not he was a tyrant disobedient

ayah: وَسَلَٰمٌ عَلَيۡهِ يَوۡمَ وُلِدَ وَيَوۡمَ يَمُوتُ وَيَوۡمَ يُبۡعَثُ حَيّٗا
ayah_translit: wasalamun alayhi yawma wulida wayawma yamutu wayawma yub'athu hayyan
ayah_english: And peace be upon him (the) day he was born and (the) day he dies and (the) day he will be raised alive

ayah: وَسَلَٰمٌ عَلَيۡهِ يَوۡمَ وُلِدَ وَيَوۡمَ يَمُوتُ وَيَوۡمَ يُبۡعَثُ حَيّٗا

ayah: وَٱذۡكُرۡ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ مَرۡيَمَ إِذِ ٱنتَبَذَتۡ مِنۡ أَهۡلِهَا مَكَانٗا شَرۡقِيّٗا
ayah_translit: wa-udh'kur fi al-kitabi maryama idhi intabadhat min ahliha makanan sharqiyyan
ayah_english: And mention in the Book Maryam when she withdrew from her family (to) a place eastern

ayah: فَٱتَّخَذَتۡ مِن دُونِهِمۡ حِجَابٗا فَأَرۡسَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡهَا رُوحَنَا فَتَمَثَّلَ لَهَا بَشَرٗا سَوِيّٗا
ayah_translit: fa-ittakhadhat min dunihim hijaban fa-arsalna ilayha ruhana fatamathala laha basharan sawiyyan
ayah_english: Then she took from them from them a screen Then We sent to her Our Spirit then he assumed the likeness for her (of) a man well-proportioned

ayah: قَالَتۡ إِنِّيٓ أَعُوذُ بِٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ مِنكَ إِن كُنتَ تَقِيّٗا
ayah_translit: qalat inni a'udhu bil-rahmani minka in kunta taqiyyan
ayah_english: She said Indeed I [I] seek refuge with the Most Gracious from you if you are God fearing

ayah: قَالَ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ رَسُولُ رَبِّكِ لِأَهَبَ لَكِ غُلَٰمٗا زَكِيّٗا
ayah_translit: qala innama ana rasulu rabbiki li-ahaba laki ghulaman zakiyyan
ayah_english: He said Only I am a Messenger (from) your Lord that I (may) bestow on you a son pure

ayah: قَالَتۡ أَنَّىٰ يَكُونُ لِي غُلَٰمٞ وَلَمۡ يَمۡسَسۡنِي بَشَرٞ وَلَمۡ أَكُ بَغِيّٗا
ayah_translit: qalat anna yakunu li ghulamun walam yamsasni basharun walam aku baghiyyan
ayah_english: She said How can be for me a son when not has touched me a man and not I am unchaste

ayah: قَالَتۡ أَنَّىٰ يَكُونُ لِي غُلَٰمٞ وَلَمۡ يَمۡسَسۡنِي بَشَرٞ وَلَمۡ أَكُ بَغِيّٗا

ayah: قَالَ كَذَٰلِكِ قَالَ رَبُّكِ هُوَ عَلَيَّ هَيِّنٞۖ وَلِنَجۡعَلَهُۥٓ ءَايَةٗ لِّلنَّاسِ وَرَحۡمَةٗ مِّنَّاۚ وَكَانَ أَمۡرٗا مَّقۡضِيّٗا
ayah_translit: qala kadhaliki qala rabbuki huwa alayya hayyinun walinaj'alahu ayatan lilnnasi warahmatan minna wakana amran maqdiyyan
ayah_english: He said Thus said your Lord It (is) for Me easy and so that We will make him a sign for the mankind and a Mercy from Us And (it) is a matter decreed

ayah: ۞فَحَمَلَتۡهُ فَٱنتَبَذَتۡ بِهِۦ مَكَانٗا قَصِيّٗا
ayah_translit: fahamalathu fa-intabadhat bihi makanan qasiyyan
ayah_english: So she conceived him and she withdrew with him (to) a place remote

ayah: فَأَجَآءَهَا ٱلۡمَخَاضُ إِلَىٰ جِذۡعِ ٱلنَّخۡلَةِ قَالَتۡ يَٰلَيۡتَنِي مِتُّ قَبۡلَ هَٰذَا وَكُنتُ نَسۡيٗا مَّنسِيّٗا
ayah_translit: fa-ajaaha al-makhadu ila jidh'i al-nakhlati qalat yalaytani mittu qabla hadha wakuntu nasyan mansiyyan
ayah_english: Then drove her the pains of childbirth to (the) trunk (of) the date-palm She said O! I wish I (had) died before this and I was (in) oblivion forgotten

ayah: فَأَجَآءَهَا ٱلۡمَخَاضُ إِلَىٰ جِذۡعِ ٱلنَّخۡلَةِ قَالَتۡ يَٰلَيۡتَنِي مِتُّ قَبۡلَ هَٰذَا وَكُنتُ نَسۡيٗا مَّنسِيّٗا

ayah: فَنَادَىٰهَا مِن تَحۡتِهَآ أَلَّا تَحۡزَنِي قَدۡ جَعَلَ رَبُّكِ تَحۡتَكِ سَرِيّٗا
ayah_translit: fanadaha min tahtiha alla tahzani qad ja'ala rabbuki tahtaki sariyyan
ayah_english: So cried to her from beneath her That (do) not grieve verily (has) placed your Lord beneath you a stream

ayah: فَنَادَىٰهَا مِن تَحۡتِهَآ أَلَّا تَحۡزَنِي قَدۡ جَعَلَ رَبُّكِ تَحۡتَكِ سَرِيّٗا

ayah: وَهُزِّيٓ إِلَيۡكِ بِجِذۡعِ ٱلنَّخۡلَةِ تُسَٰقِطۡ عَلَيۡكِ رُطَبٗا جَنِيّٗا
ayah_translit: wahuzzi ilayki bijidh'i al-nakhlati tusaqit alayki rutaban janiyyan
ayah_english: And shake towards you (the) trunk (of) the date-palm it will drop upon you fresh dates ripe

ayah: فَكُلِي وَٱشۡرَبِي وَقَرِّي عَيۡنٗاۖ فَإِمَّا تَرَيِنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡبَشَرِ أَحَدٗا فَقُولِيٓ إِنِّي نَذَرۡتُ لِلرَّحۡمَٰنِ صَوۡمٗا فَلَنۡ أُكَلِّمَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ إِنسِيّٗا
ayah_translit: fakuli wa-ish'rabi waqarri aynan fa-imma tarayinna mina al-bashari ahadan faquli inni nadhartu lilrrahmani sawman falan ukallima al-yawma insiyyan
ayah_english: So eat and drink and cool (your) eyes And if you see from human being anyone then say Indeed I [I] have vowed to the Most Gracious a fast so not I will speak today (to any) human being

ayah: فَكُلِي وَٱشۡرَبِي وَقَرِّي عَيۡنٗاۖ فَإِمَّا تَرَيِنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡبَشَرِ أَحَدٗا فَقُولِيٓ إِنِّي نَذَرۡتُ لِلرَّحۡمَٰنِ صَوۡمٗا فَلَنۡ أُكَلِّمَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ إِنسِيّٗا

ayah: فَكُلِي وَٱشۡرَبِي وَقَرِّي عَيۡنٗاۖ فَإِمَّا تَرَيِنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡبَشَرِ أَحَدٗا فَقُولِيٓ إِنِّي نَذَرۡتُ لِلرَّحۡمَٰنِ صَوۡمٗا فَلَنۡ أُكَلِّمَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ إِنسِيّٗا

ayah: فَأَتَتۡ بِهِۦ قَوۡمَهَا تَحۡمِلُهُۥۖ قَالُواْ يَٰمَرۡيَمُ لَقَدۡ جِئۡتِ شَيۡـٔٗا فَرِيّٗا
ayah_translit: fa-atat bihi qawmaha tahmiluhu qalu yamaryamu laqad ji'ti shayan fariyyan
ayah_english: Then she came with him (to) her people carrying him They said O Maryam Certainly you (have) brought an amazing thing an amazing thing

ayah: يَـٰٓأُخۡتَ هَٰرُونَ مَا كَانَ أَبُوكِ ٱمۡرَأَ سَوۡءٖ وَمَا كَانَتۡ أُمُّكِ بَغِيّٗا
ayah_translit: yaukh'ta haruna ma kana abuki im'ra-a sawin wama kanat ummuki baghiyyan
ayah_english: O sister (of) Harun Not was your father an evil man an evil man and not was your mother unchaste

ayah: فَأَشَارَتۡ إِلَيۡهِۖ قَالُواْ كَيۡفَ نُكَلِّمُ مَن كَانَ فِي ٱلۡمَهۡدِ صَبِيّٗا
ayah_translit: fa-asharat ilayhi qalu kayfa nukallimu man kana fi al-mahdi sabiyyan
ayah_english: Then she pointed to him They said How (can) we speak (to one) who is in the cradle a child

ayah: قَالَ إِنِّي عَبۡدُ ٱللَّهِ ءَاتَىٰنِيَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَجَعَلَنِي نَبِيّٗا
ayah_translit: qala inni abdu al-lahi ataniya al-kitaba waja'alani nabiyyan
ayah_english: He said Indeed I am a slave (of) Allah He gave me the Scripture and made me a Prophet

ayah: وَجَعَلَنِي مُبَارَكًا أَيۡنَ مَا كُنتُ وَأَوۡصَٰنِي بِٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَٱلزَّكَوٰةِ مَا دُمۡتُ حَيّٗا
ayah_translit: waja'alani mubarakan ayna ma kuntu wa-awsani bil-salati wal-zakati ma dum'tu hayyan
ayah_english: And He (has) made me blessed wherever wherever I am and has enjoined (on) me [of] the prayer and zakah as long as I am as long as I am alive

ayah: وَٱلسَّلَٰمُ عَلَيَّ يَوۡمَ وُلِدتُّ وَيَوۡمَ أَمُوتُ وَيَوۡمَ أُبۡعَثُ حَيّٗا
ayah_translit: wal-salamu alayya yawma wulidttu wayawma amutu wayawma ub'athu hayyan
ayah_english: And peace (be) on me (the) day I was born and (the) day I will die and (the) Day I will be raised alive

ayah: ذَٰلِكَ عِيسَى ٱبۡنُ مَرۡيَمَۖ قَوۡلَ ٱلۡحَقِّ ٱلَّذِي فِيهِ يَمۡتَرُونَ
ayah_translit: dhalika isa ub'nu maryama qawla al-haqi alladhi fihi yamtaruna
ayah_english: That (was) Isa (the) son (of) Maryam a statement (of) truth that which about it they dispute

ayah: مَا كَانَ لِلَّهِ أَن يَتَّخِذَ مِن وَلَدٖۖ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥٓۚ إِذَا قَضَىٰٓ أَمۡرٗا فَإِنَّمَا يَقُولُ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ
ayah_translit: ma kana lillahi an yattakhidha min waladin sub'hanahu idha qada amran fa-innama yaqulu lahu kun fayakunu
ayah_english: Not (it) is for Allah that He should take any son any son Glory be to Him When He decrees a matter then only He says to it Be and it is

ayah: مَا كَانَ لِلَّهِ أَن يَتَّخِذَ مِن وَلَدٖۖ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥٓۚ إِذَا قَضَىٰٓ أَمۡرٗا فَإِنَّمَا يَقُولُ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ

ayah: وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ رَبِّي وَرَبُّكُمۡ فَٱعۡبُدُوهُۚ هَٰذَا صِرَٰطٞ مُّسۡتَقِيمٞ
ayah_translit: wa-inna al-laha rabbi warabbukum fa-u'buduhu hadha siratun mus'taqimun
ayah_english: And indeed Allah (is) my Lord and your Lord so worship Him This (is) a path straight

ayah: فَٱخۡتَلَفَ ٱلۡأَحۡزَابُ مِنۢ بَيۡنِهِمۡۖ فَوَيۡلٞ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِن مَّشۡهَدِ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٍ
ayah_translit: fa-ikh'talafa al-ahzabu min baynihim fawaylun lilladhina kafaru min mashhadi yawmin azimin
ayah_english: But differed the sects from among them from among them so woe to those who disbelieve from (the) witnessing (of) a Day great

ayah: أَسۡمِعۡ بِهِمۡ وَأَبۡصِرۡ يَوۡمَ يَأۡتُونَنَا لَٰكِنِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ
ayah_translit: asmi' bihim wa-absir yawma yatunana lakini al-zalimuna al-yawma fi dalalin mubinin
ayah_english: How they will hear How they will hear and how (they will) see (the) Day they will come to Us but the wrongdoers today (are) in error clear

ayah: أَسۡمِعۡ بِهِمۡ وَأَبۡصِرۡ يَوۡمَ يَأۡتُونَنَا لَٰكِنِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ
ayah_translit: asmi' bihim wa-absir yawma yatunana lakini al-zalimuna al-yawma fi dalalin mubinin
ayah_english: How they will hear How they will hear and how (they will) see (the) Day they will come to Us but the wrongdoers today (are) in error clear

ayah: وَأَنذِرۡهُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡحَسۡرَةِ إِذۡ قُضِيَ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ وَهُمۡ فِي غَفۡلَةٖ وَهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-andhir'hum yawma al-hasrati idh qudiya al-amru wahum fi ghaflatin wahum la yu'minuna
ayah_english: And warn them (of the) Day (of) the Regret when has been decided the matter And they (are) in heedlessness and they (do) not believe

ayah: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نَرِثُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَنۡ عَلَيۡهَا وَإِلَيۡنَا يُرۡجَعُونَ
ayah_translit: inna nahnu narithu al-arda waman alayha wa-ilayna yur'ja'una
ayah_english: Indeed We [We] [We] will inherit the earth and whoever (is) on it and to Us they will be returned

ayah: وَٱذۡكُرۡ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ صِدِّيقٗا نَّبِيًّا
ayah_translit: wa-udh'kur fi al-kitabi ib'rahima innahu kana siddiqan nabiyyan
ayah_english: And mention in the Book Ibrahim Indeed he was a man of truth a Prophet

ayah: إِذۡ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ يَـٰٓأَبَتِ لِمَ تَعۡبُدُ مَا لَا يَسۡمَعُ وَلَا يُبۡصِرُ وَلَا يُغۡنِي عَنكَ شَيۡـٔٗا
ayah_translit: idh qala li-abihi yaabati lima ta'budu ma la yasma'u wala yub'siru wala yugh'ni anka shayan
ayah_english: When he said to his father O my father! Why (do) you worship that which not hears and not sees and not benefits [to] you (in) anything

ayah: إِذۡ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ يَـٰٓأَبَتِ لِمَ تَعۡبُدُ مَا لَا يَسۡمَعُ وَلَا يُبۡصِرُ وَلَا يُغۡنِي عَنكَ شَيۡـٔٗا
ayah_translit: idh qala li-abihi yaabati lima ta'budu ma la yasma'u wala yub'siru wala yugh'ni anka shayan
ayah_english: When he said to his father O my father! Why (do) you worship that which not hears and not sees and not benefits [to] you (in) anything

ayah: إِذۡ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ يَـٰٓأَبَتِ لِمَ تَعۡبُدُ مَا لَا يَسۡمَعُ وَلَا يُبۡصِرُ وَلَا يُغۡنِي عَنكَ شَيۡـٔٗا

ayah: يَـٰٓأَبَتِ إِنِّي قَدۡ جَآءَنِي مِنَ ٱلۡعِلۡمِ مَا لَمۡ يَأۡتِكَ فَٱتَّبِعۡنِيٓ أَهۡدِكَ صِرَٰطٗا سَوِيّٗا
ayah_translit: yaabati inni qad jaani mina al-'il'mi ma lam yatika fa-ittabi'ni ahdika siratan sawiyyan
ayah_english: O my father! Indeed [I] verily (has) come to me of the knowledge what not came to you so follow me I will guide you (to) the path even

ayah: يَـٰٓأَبَتِ لَا تَعۡبُدِ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنَۖ إِنَّ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنَ كَانَ لِلرَّحۡمَٰنِ عَصِيّٗا
ayah_translit: yaabati la ta'budi al-shaytana inna al-shaytana kana lilrrahmani asiyyan
ayah_english: O my father! (Do) not worship the Shaitaan Indeed the Shaitaan is to the Most Gracious disobedient

ayah: يَـٰٓأَبَتِ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ أَن يَمَسَّكَ عَذَابٞ مِّنَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ فَتَكُونَ لِلشَّيۡطَٰنِ وَلِيّٗا
ayah_translit: yaabati inni akhafu an yamassaka adhabun mina al-rahmani fatakuna lilshaytani waliyyan
ayah_english: O my father! Indeed I [I] fear that will touch you a punishment from the Most Gracious so you would be to the Shaitaan a friend

ayah: قَالَ أَرَاغِبٌ أَنتَ عَنۡ ءَالِهَتِي يَـٰٓإِبۡرَٰهِيمُۖ لَئِن لَّمۡ تَنتَهِ لَأَرۡجُمَنَّكَۖ وَٱهۡجُرۡنِي مَلِيّٗا
ayah_translit: qala araghibun anta an alihati yaib'rahimu la-in lam tantahi la-arjumannaka wa-uh'jur'ni maliyyan
ayah_english: He said Do you hate Do you hate (from) my gods O Ibrahim Surely, if not you desist surely, I will stone you so leave me (for) a prolonged time

ayah: قَالَ أَرَاغِبٌ أَنتَ عَنۡ ءَالِهَتِي يَـٰٓإِبۡرَٰهِيمُۖ لَئِن لَّمۡ تَنتَهِ لَأَرۡجُمَنَّكَۖ وَٱهۡجُرۡنِي مَلِيّٗا

ayah: قَالَ سَلَٰمٌ عَلَيۡكَۖ سَأَسۡتَغۡفِرُ لَكَ رَبِّيٓۖ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ بِي حَفِيّٗا
ayah_translit: qala salamun alayka sa-astaghfiru laka rabbi innahu kana bi hafiyyan
ayah_english: He said Peace (be) on you I will ask forgiveness for you (from) my Lord Indeed He is to me Ever Gracious

ayah: وَأَعۡتَزِلُكُمۡ وَمَا تَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَأَدۡعُواْ رَبِّي عَسَىٰٓ أَلَّآ أَكُونَ بِدُعَآءِ رَبِّي شَقِيّٗا
ayah_translit: wa-a'tazilukum wama tad'una min duni al-lahi wa-ad'u rabbi asa alla akuna bidu'ai rabbi shaqiyyan
ayah_english: And I will leave you and what you invoke besides besides Allah and I will invoke my Lord May be that not I will be in invocation (to) my Lord unblessed

ayah: وَأَعۡتَزِلُكُمۡ وَمَا تَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَأَدۡعُواْ رَبِّي عَسَىٰٓ أَلَّآ أَكُونَ بِدُعَآءِ رَبِّي شَقِيّٗا
ayah_translit: wa-a'tazilukum wama tad'una min duni al-lahi wa-ad'u rabbi asa alla akuna bidu'ai rabbi shaqiyyan
ayah_english: And I will leave you and what you invoke besides besides Allah and I will invoke my Lord May be that not I will be in invocation (to) my Lord unblessed

ayah: فَلَمَّا ٱعۡتَزَلَهُمۡ وَمَا يَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَهَبۡنَا لَهُۥٓ إِسۡحَٰقَ وَيَعۡقُوبَۖ وَكُلّٗا جَعَلۡنَا نَبِيّٗا
ayah_translit: falamma i'tazalahum wama ya'buduna min duni al-lahi wahabna lahu is'haqa waya'quba wakullan ja'alna nabiyyan
ayah_english: So when he left them and what they worshipped besides Allah besides Allah besides Allah [and] We bestowed [to] him Ishaq and Yaqub and each (of them) We made a Prophet

ayah: فَلَمَّا ٱعۡتَزَلَهُمۡ وَمَا يَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَهَبۡنَا لَهُۥٓ إِسۡحَٰقَ وَيَعۡقُوبَۖ وَكُلّٗا جَعَلۡنَا نَبِيّٗا

ayah: وَنَٰدَيۡنَٰهُ مِن جَانِبِ ٱلطُّورِ ٱلۡأَيۡمَنِ وَقَرَّبۡنَٰهُ نَجِيّٗا
ayah_translit: wanadaynahu min janibi al-turi al-aymani waqarrabnahu najiyyan

ayah: وَٱذۡكُرۡ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ إِسۡمَٰعِيلَۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ صَادِقَ ٱلۡوَعۡدِ وَكَانَ رَسُولٗا نَّبِيّٗا
ayah_translit: wa-udh'kur fi al-kitabi is'ma'ila innahu kana sadiqa al-wa'di wakana rasulan nabiyyan

ayah: وَكَانَ يَأۡمُرُ أَهۡلَهُۥ بِٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَٱلزَّكَوٰةِ وَكَانَ عِندَ رَبِّهِۦ مَرۡضِيّٗا
ayah_translit: wakana yamuru ahlahu bil-salati wal-zakati wakana inda rabbihi mardiyyan
ayah_english: And he used (to) enjoin (on) his people the prayer and zakah and was near his Lord pleasing

ayah_translit: wa-udh'kur fi al-kitabi id'risa innahu kana siddiqan nabiyyan
ayah_english: And mention in the Book Idris Indeed he was truthful a Prophet

ayah: وَرَفَعۡنَٰهُ مَكَانًا عَلِيًّا
ayah_translit: warafa'nahu makanan aliyyan
ayah_english: And We raised him (to) a position high

ayah: وَرَفَعۡنَٰهُ مَكَانًا عَلِيًّا
ayah_translit: warafa'nahu makanan aliyyan
ayah_english: And We raised him (to) a position high

ayah: وَرَفَعۡنَٰهُ مَكَانًا عَلِيًّا
ayah_translit: warafa'nahu makanan aliyyan
ayah_english: And We raised him (to) a position high

ayah: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَنۡعَمَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهِم مِّنَ ٱلنَّبِيِّـۧنَ مِن ذُرِّيَّةِ ءَادَمَ وَمِمَّنۡ حَمَلۡنَا مَعَ نُوحٖ وَمِن ذُرِّيَّةِ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ وَإِسۡرَـٰٓءِيلَ وَمِمَّنۡ هَدَيۡنَا وَٱجۡتَبَيۡنَآۚ إِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَايَٰتُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ خَرُّواْۤ سُجَّدٗاۤ وَبُكِيّٗا۩
ayah_translit: ulaika alladhina an'ama al-lahu alayhim mina al-nabiyina min dhurriyyati adama wamimman hamalna ma'a nuhin wamin dhurriyyati ib'rahima wa-is'raila wamimman hadayna wa-ij'tabayna idha tut'la alayhim ayatu al-rahmani kharru sujjadan wabukiyyan
ayah_english: Those (were) the ones whom Allah bestowed favor Allah bestowed favor upon them from (among) the Prophets of (the) offspring (of) Adam and of those We carried with Nuh and of (the) offspring (of) Ibrahim and Israel and of (those) whom We guided and We chose When were recited to them (the) Verses (of) the Most Gracious they fell prostrating and weeping

ayah: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَنۡعَمَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهِم مِّنَ ٱلنَّبِيِّـۧنَ مِن ذُرِّيَّةِ ءَادَمَ وَمِمَّنۡ حَمَلۡنَا مَعَ نُوحٖ وَمِن ذُرِّيَّةِ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ وَإِسۡرَـٰٓءِيلَ وَمِمَّنۡ هَدَيۡنَا وَٱجۡتَبَيۡنَآۚ إِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَايَٰتُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ خَرُّواْۤ سُجَّدٗاۤ وَبُكِيّٗا۩

ayah: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَنۡعَمَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهِم مِّنَ ٱلنَّبِيِّـۧنَ مِن ذُرِّيَّةِ ءَادَمَ وَمِمَّنۡ حَمَلۡنَا مَعَ نُوحٖ وَمِن ذُرِّيَّةِ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ وَإِسۡرَـٰٓءِيلَ وَمِمَّنۡ هَدَيۡنَا وَٱجۡتَبَيۡنَآۚ إِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَايَٰتُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ خَرُّواْۤ سُجَّدٗاۤ وَبُكِيّٗا۩

ayah: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَنۡعَمَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهِم مِّنَ ٱلنَّبِيِّـۧنَ مِن ذُرِّيَّةِ ءَادَمَ وَمِمَّنۡ حَمَلۡنَا مَعَ نُوحٖ وَمِن ذُرِّيَّةِ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ وَإِسۡرَـٰٓءِيلَ وَمِمَّنۡ هَدَيۡنَا وَٱجۡتَبَيۡنَآۚ إِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَايَٰتُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ خَرُّواْۤ سُجَّدٗاۤ وَبُكِيّٗا۩

ayah: ۞فَخَلَفَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡ خَلۡفٌ أَضَاعُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَٱتَّبَعُواْ ٱلشَّهَوَٰتِۖ فَسَوۡفَ يَلۡقَوۡنَ غَيًّا
ayah_translit: fakhalafa min ba'dihim khalfun ada'u al-salata wa-ittaba'u al-shahawati fasawfa yalqawna ghayyan
ayah_english: Then succeeded after them after them successors who neglected the prayer and they followed the lusts so soon they will meet evil

ayah: ۞فَخَلَفَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡ خَلۡفٌ أَضَاعُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَٱتَّبَعُواْ ٱلشَّهَوَٰتِۖ فَسَوۡفَ يَلۡقَوۡنَ غَيًّا
ayah_translit: fakhalafa min ba'dihim khalfun ada'u al-salata wa-ittaba'u al-shahawati fasawfa yalqawna ghayyan
ayah_english: Then succeeded after them after them successors who neglected the prayer and they followed the lusts so soon they will meet evil

ayah: إِلَّا مَن تَابَ وَءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ يَدۡخُلُونَ ٱلۡجَنَّةَ وَلَا يُظۡلَمُونَ شَيۡـٔٗا
ayah_translit: illa man taba waamana wa'amila salihan fa-ulaika yadkhuluna al-janata wala yuz'lamuna shayan
ayah_english: Except (one) who repented and believed and did good (deeds) Then those will enter Paradise and not they will be wronged (in) anything

ayah: جَنَّـٰتِ عَدۡنٍ ٱلَّتِي وَعَدَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ عِبَادَهُۥ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ وَعۡدُهُۥ مَأۡتِيّٗا
ayah_translit: jannati adnin allati wa'ada al-rahmanu ibadahu bil-ghaybi innahu kana wa'duhu matiyyan
ayah_english: Gardens (of) Eden which promised the Most Gracious (to) His slaves in the unseen Indeed [it] is His promise sure to come

ayah: جَنَّـٰتِ عَدۡنٍ ٱلَّتِي وَعَدَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ عِبَادَهُۥ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ وَعۡدُهُۥ مَأۡتِيّٗا

ayah: لَّا يَسۡمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغۡوًا إِلَّا سَلَٰمٗاۖ وَلَهُمۡ رِزۡقُهُمۡ فِيهَا بُكۡرَةٗ وَعَشِيّٗا
ayah_translit: la yasma'una fiha laghwan illa salaman walahum riz'quhum fiha buk'ratan wa'ashiyyan
ayah_english: Not they will hear therein vain talk but peace And for them (is) their provision therein morning and evening

ayah: تِلۡكَ ٱلۡجَنَّةُ ٱلَّتِي نُورِثُ مِنۡ عِبَادِنَا مَن كَانَ تَقِيّٗا
ayah_translit: til'ka al-janatu allati nurithu min ibadina man kana taqiyyan
ayah_english: This (is) Paradise which We give (as) inheritance [of] (to) Our slaves (the one) who is righteous

ayah: تِلۡكَ ٱلۡجَنَّةُ ٱلَّتِي نُورِثُ مِنۡ عِبَادِنَا مَن كَانَ تَقِيّٗا

ayah: وَمَا نَتَنَزَّلُ إِلَّا بِأَمۡرِ رَبِّكَۖ لَهُۥ مَا بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِينَا وَمَا خَلۡفَنَا وَمَا بَيۡنَ ذَٰلِكَۚ وَمَا كَانَ رَبُّكَ نَسِيّٗا
ayah_translit: wama natanazzalu illa bi-amri rabbika lahu ma bayna aydina wama khalfana wama bayna dhalika wama kana rabbuka nasiyyan

ayah: رَّبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا فَٱعۡبُدۡهُ وَٱصۡطَبِرۡ لِعِبَٰدَتِهِۦۚ هَلۡ تَعۡلَمُ لَهُۥ سَمِيّٗا
ayah_translit: rabbu al-samawati wal-ardi wama baynahuma fa-u'bud'hu wa-is'tabir li'ibadatihi hal ta'lamu lahu samiyyan
ayah_english: Lord (of) the heavens and the earth and whatever (is) between both of them so worship Him and be constant in His worship Do you know for Him any similarity

ayah: رَّبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا فَٱعۡبُدۡهُ وَٱصۡطَبِرۡ لِعِبَٰدَتِهِۦۚ هَلۡ تَعۡلَمُ لَهُۥ سَمِيّٗا

ayah_english: Lord (of) the heavens and the earth and whatever (is) between both of them so worship Him and be constant in His worship Do you know for Him any similarity

ayah: وَيَقُولُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ أَءِذَا مَا مِتُّ لَسَوۡفَ أُخۡرَجُ حَيًّا
ayah_translit: wayaqulu al-insanu a-idha ma mittu lasawfa ukh'raju hayyan
ayah_english: And says [the] man What! When What! When I am dead surely will I be brought forth alive

ayah: وَيَقُولُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ أَءِذَا مَا مِتُّ لَسَوۡفَ أُخۡرَجُ حَيًّا

ayah: أَوَلَا يَذۡكُرُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ أَنَّا خَلَقۡنَٰهُ مِن قَبۡلُ وَلَمۡ يَكُ شَيۡـٔٗا
ayah_translit: awala yadhkuru al-insanu anna khalaqnahu min qablu walam yaku shayan
ayah_english: Does not remember [the] man that We We created him before before while not he was anything

ayah: فَوَرَبِّكَ لَنَحۡشُرَنَّهُمۡ وَٱلشَّيَٰطِينَ ثُمَّ لَنُحۡضِرَنَّهُمۡ حَوۡلَ جَهَنَّمَ جِثِيّٗا
ayah_translit: fawarabbika lanahshurannahum wal-shayatina thumma lanuh'dirannahum hawla jahannama jithiyyan
ayah_english: So by your Lord surely We will gather them and the devils then surely We will bring them around Hell bent (on) knees

ayah: فَوَرَبِّكَ لَنَحۡشُرَنَّهُمۡ وَٱلشَّيَٰطِينَ ثُمَّ لَنُحۡضِرَنَّهُمۡ حَوۡلَ جَهَنَّمَ جِثِيّٗا

ayah: ثُمَّ لَنَنزِعَنَّ مِن كُلِّ شِيعَةٍ أَيُّهُمۡ أَشَدُّ عَلَى ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ عِتِيّٗا
ayah_translit: thumma lananzi'anna min kulli shi'atin ayyuhum ashaddu ala al-rahmani itiyyan
ayah_english: Then surely We will drag out from every sect those of them (who were) worst against the Most Gracious (in) rebellion

ayah: ثُمَّ لَنَنزِعَنَّ مِن كُلِّ شِيعَةٍ أَيُّهُمۡ أَشَدُّ عَلَى ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ عِتِيّٗا

ayah: ثُمَّ لَنَحۡنُ أَعۡلَمُ بِٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ أَوۡلَىٰ بِهَا صِلِيّٗا
ayah_translit: thumma lanahnu a'lamu bi-alladhina hum awla biha siliyyan
ayah_english: Then surely We know best [of] those who [they] (are) most worthy therein (of) being burnt

ayah_english: Then surely We know best [of] those who [they] (are) most worthy therein (of) being burnt

ayah: وَإِن مِّنكُمۡ إِلَّا وَارِدُهَاۚ كَانَ عَلَىٰ رَبِّكَ حَتۡمٗا مَّقۡضِيّٗا
ayah_translit: wa-in minkum illa wariduha kana ala rabbika hatman maqdiyyan
ayah_english: And (there is) not (any) of you but (will be) passing over it (This) is upon your Lord an inevitability decreed

ayah: وَإِن مِّنكُمۡ إِلَّا وَارِدُهَاۚ كَانَ عَلَىٰ رَبِّكَ حَتۡمٗا مَّقۡضِيّٗا

ayah: ثُمَّ نُنَجِّي ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَواْ وَّنَذَرُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ فِيهَا جِثِيّٗا
ayah_translit: thumma nunajji alladhina ittaqaw wanadharu al-zalimina fiha jithiyyan
ayah_english: Then We will deliver those who feared (Allah) and We will leave the wrongdoers therein bent (on) knees

ayah: وَإِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَايَٰتُنَا بَيِّنَٰتٖ قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ أَيُّ ٱلۡفَرِيقَيۡنِ خَيۡرٞ مَّقَامٗا وَأَحۡسَنُ نَدِيّٗا
ayah_translit: wa-idha tut'la alayhim ayatuna bayyinatin qala alladhina kafaru lilladhina amanu ayyu al-fariqayni khayrun maqaman wa-ahsanu nadiyyan
ayah_english: And when are recited to them Our Verses clear say those who disbelieved to those who believed Which (of) the two groups (is) better (in) position and best (in) assembly

ayah: وَإِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَايَٰتُنَا بَيِّنَٰتٖ قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ أَيُّ ٱلۡفَرِيقَيۡنِ خَيۡرٞ مَّقَامٗا وَأَحۡسَنُ نَدِيّٗا

ayah: وَكَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا قَبۡلَهُم مِّن قَرۡنٍ هُمۡ أَحۡسَنُ أَثَٰثٗا وَرِءۡيٗا
ayah_translit: wakam ahlakna qablahum min qarnin hum ahsanu athathan wari'yan
ayah_english: And how many We destroyed before them of a generation they (were) better (in) possessions and appearance

ayah: وَكَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا قَبۡلَهُم مِّن قَرۡنٍ هُمۡ أَحۡسَنُ أَثَٰثٗا وَرِءۡيٗا
ayah_translit: wakam ahlakna qablahum min qarnin hum ahsanu athathan wari'yan
ayah_english: And how many We destroyed before them of a generation they (were) better (in) possessions and appearance

ayah: وَكَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا قَبۡلَهُم مِّن قَرۡنٍ هُمۡ أَحۡسَنُ أَثَٰثٗا وَرِءۡيٗا
ayah_translit: wakam ahlakna qablahum min qarnin hum ahsanu athathan wari'yan
ayah_english: And how many We destroyed before them of a generation they (were) better (in) possessions and appearance

ayah: قُلۡ مَن كَانَ فِي ٱلضَّلَٰلَةِ فَلۡيَمۡدُدۡ لَهُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ مَدًّاۚ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا رَأَوۡاْ مَا يُوعَدُونَ إِمَّا ٱلۡعَذَابَ وَإِمَّا ٱلسَّاعَةَ فَسَيَعۡلَمُونَ مَنۡ هُوَ شَرّٞ مَّكَانٗا وَأَضۡعَفُ جُندٗا
ayah_translit: qul man kana fi al-dalalati falyamdud lahu al-rahmanu maddan hatta idha ra-aw ma yu'aduna imma al-'adhaba wa-imma al-sa'ata fasaya'lamuna man huwa sharrun makanan wa-ad'afu jundan
ayah_english: Say Whoever is in [the] error then surely will extend for him the Most Gracious an extension until when they see what they were promised either the punishment or the Hour then they will know who [he] (is) worst (in) position and weaker (in) forces

ayah: قُلۡ مَن كَانَ فِي ٱلضَّلَٰلَةِ فَلۡيَمۡدُدۡ لَهُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ مَدًّاۚ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا رَأَوۡاْ مَا يُوعَدُونَ إِمَّا ٱلۡعَذَابَ وَإِمَّا ٱلسَّاعَةَ فَسَيَعۡلَمُونَ مَنۡ هُوَ شَرّٞ مَّكَانٗا وَأَضۡعَفُ جُندٗا

ayah: وَيَزِيدُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱهۡتَدَوۡاْ هُدٗىۗ وَٱلۡبَٰقِيَٰتُ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتُ خَيۡرٌ عِندَ رَبِّكَ ثَوَابٗا وَخَيۡرٞ مَّرَدًّا
ayah_translit: wayazidu al-lahu alladhina ih'tadaw hudan wal-baqiyatu al-salihatu khayrun inda rabbika thawaban wakhayrun maraddan
ayah_english: And Allah increases And Allah increases those who accept guidance (in) guidance And the everlasting good deeds (are) better near your Lord (for) reward and better (for) return

ayah: أَفَرَءَيۡتَ ٱلَّذِي كَفَرَ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَقَالَ لَأُوتَيَنَّ مَالٗا وَوَلَدًا
ayah_translit: afara-ayta alladhi kafara biayatina waqala lautayanna malan wawaladan
ayah_english: Then have you seen he who disbelieved in Our Verses and said Surely I will be given wealth and children

ayah_translit: attala'a al-ghayba ami ittakhadha inda al-rahmani ahdan

ayah_translit: kalla sanaktubu ma yaqulu wanamuddu lahu mina al-'adhabi maddan
ayah_english: Nay We will record what he says and We will extend for him from the punishment extensively

ayah: تَكَادُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتُ يَتَفَطَّرۡنَ مِنۡهُ وَتَنشَقُّ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَتَخِرُّ ٱلۡجِبَالُ هَدًّا
ayah_translit: takadu al-samawatu yatafattarna min'hu watanshaqqu al-ardu watakhirru al-jibalu haddan

ayah_translit: in kullu man fi al-samawati wal-ardi illa ati al-rahmani abdan

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ سَيَجۡعَلُ لَهُمُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وُدّٗا
ayah_translit: inna alladhina amanu wa'amilu al-salihati sayaj'alu lahumu al-rahmanu wuddan
ayah_english: Indeed those who believed and did good deeds will bestow for them the Most Gracious affection

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ سَيَجۡعَلُ لَهُمُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وُدّٗا
ayah_translit: inna alladhina amanu wa'amilu al-salihati sayaj'alu lahumu al-rahmanu wuddan
ayah_english: Indeed those who believed and did good deeds will bestow for them the Most Gracious affection

ayah: فَإِنَّمَا يَسَّرۡنَٰهُ بِلِسَانِكَ لِتُبَشِّرَ بِهِ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ وَتُنذِرَ بِهِۦ قَوۡمٗا لُّدّٗا
ayah_translit: fa-innama yassarnahu bilisanika litubashira bihi al-mutaqina watundhira bihi qawman luddan
ayah_english: So only We (have) made it easy in your tongue that you may give glad tidings with it (to) the righteous and warn with it a people hostile

ayah: فَإِنَّمَا يَسَّرۡنَٰهُ بِلِسَانِكَ لِتُبَشِّرَ بِهِ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ وَتُنذِرَ بِهِۦ قَوۡمٗا لُّدّٗا

ayah: وَكَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا قَبۡلَهُم مِّن قَرۡنٍ هَلۡ تُحِسُّ مِنۡهُم مِّنۡ أَحَدٍ أَوۡ تَسۡمَعُ لَهُمۡ رِكۡزَۢا
ayah_translit: wakam ahlakna qablahum min qarnin hal tuhissu min'hum min ahadin aw tasma'u lahum rik'zan
ayah_english: And how many We (have) destroyed before them of a generation Can you perceive of them any one or hear from them a sound
